extendedIngredients.name: macaroni
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 package (7 ounces) shell macaroni, cooked and drained

recipes.title: Ham Pasta Salad

winePairing.pairingText: No one wine will suit every pasta dish. Pasta in a tomato-based sauce will usually work well with a medium-bodied red, such as a montepulciano or chianti. Pasta with seafood or pesto will fare better with a light-bodied white, such as a pinot grigio. Cheese-heavy pasta can pair well with red or white - you might try a sangiovese wine for hard cheeses and a chardonnay for soft cheeses. We may be able to make a better recommendation if you ask again with a specific pasta dish.

recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a large bowl, toss macaroni with ham, green pepper, tomato and onion. In a small bowl, combine Miracle Whip, Parmesan cheese, milk and salt. Pour over pasta mixture and stir to coat. Cover and refrigerate.                                                                                            Sprinkle with additional Parmesan before serving.                                        Yield: 4-6 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Ham Pasta Salad in  Country WomanMarch/April 1994, p33                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving (1 cup) equals 366 calories, 20 g fat (4 g saturated fat), 35 mg cholesterol, 865 mg sodium, 30 g carbohydrate, 2 g fiber, 15 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a large bowl, toss macaroni with ham, green pepper, tomato and onion. In a small bowl, combine Miracle Whip, Parmesan cheese, milk and salt.
Pour over pasta mixture and stir to coat. Cover and refrigerate.
Sprinkle with additional Parmesan before serving.
